central_thesis: True magical systems, particularly Enochian Magic, are operative rather than merely illustrative. The technique of "rising on the planes," when preceded by deep internalization of the magical system, serves as a practical method for achieving self-transformation and manifesting willed changes in the objective universe.

structure_content.chapter_title: Introduction to Operative Enochian Black Magic
structure_content.summary: The author corrects the common misconception that Enochian Magic is purely subjective. He asserts its operative nature, citing historical applications by John Dee and Anton LaVey, and states his skepticism towards systems that cannot effect observable objective change.

It is emphasized that any magical system must be deeply internalized and become a 'living series of keys' within the practitioner's psyche for operative results. Without this inner resonance, techniques like 'rising on the planes' are ineffective.

structure_content.chapter_title: The Technique of 'Rising on the Planes'
structure_content.summary: The technique involves a visualized ascent through concentric rings representing the magician and successive Æthyrs (e.g., TEX, RII, BAG), aiming to explore and integrate facets of the psyche, culminating in the projection of a willed outcome from the deepest psychic levels.

Detailed steps for performing the ritual are provided, including defining the working's result (as an Enochian word/phrase, letters, sigil, or visualization), an optional Enochian invocation, and the physical/mental ascent through the Æthyrs, followed by casting the intention and a controlled return.

The article suggests that intentions projected through this method will manifest in the objective world, yielding knowledge, insights, or concrete results. It also mentions future, more technical articles on Enochian Magic will be published elsewhere.

key_concepts.definition: The practical application of Enochian magical principles and techniques to intentionally cause tangible changes in the objective universe, moving beyond mere subjective or illustrative experiences.

A specific operative magical technique involving a visualized, willed ascent through successive layers or spheres of consciousness (represented by Enochian Æthyrs or other internal models) to project a defined intention from the deepest parts of the psyche for manifestation in reality.

The process by which a magical system or tradition (e.g., Enochian) is absorbed and integrated into the practitioner's inner being, transforming intellectual knowledge into a 'living, inner reality' that acts as an effective tool for operative magic.

Spheres or levels of existence and consciousness within the Enochian system. In the context of 'rising on the planes,' specific Æthyrs (like TEX, RII, BAG) are traversed as representations of progressively deeper psychic states during the ascent.

A concentrated, symbolic representation of the desired magical outcome. This must be clearly defined before a 'rising on the planes' working and is 'cast adrift' from the deepest psychic depths to initiate manifestation.

practical_system.description: The 'Rising on the Planes' is an operative magical system designed to project a willed intention from the deepest internalized layers of the magician's psyche into the objective universe. Its efficacy depends on the prior internalization of a magical system (e.g., Enochian Æthyrs), transforming it into a living, inner reality that can be actively traversed and utilized for manifestation.
tools: An internalized magical system (e.g., Enochian Æthyrs, Tree of Life paths, Runes, Ogham).
Enochian letters (for conceptualizing and defining the working's purpose).
A clearly formulated word, phrase, sigil, or vivid visualization representing the desired outcome.
Optional: A pre-recorded audio of Æthyr and Governor names to aid concentration during ascent.
Implicit: Strong visualization skills, self-discipline, and a deeply established inner resonance with the chosen magical framework.
rituals: **Preparation**: Clearly define the intended magical result, expressing it as an Enochian word/phrase, specific letters, an Austin Spare-style sigil, or a potent visualization. Dedicate significant forethought to the purpose of the working.
**Opening the Ritual (Optional)**: Compose and recite an invocation, ideally in Enochian, to set the magical space and intent.

**The Rising**: Adopt a comfortable physical posture. Through strong will, initiate an astral or self-hypnotic 'rise' from the physical body. Visualize ascending into the first Æthyr (e.g., TEX), verbally calling its name and invoking its Governors. Continue this ascent progressively through subsequent Æthyrs (RII, BAG, etc.), striving to penetrate the 'hidden depths of your psyche.' This process may induce intense sensations, described as 'agony' or a 'taut elastic band' feeling.
**Casting the Intention**: At the peak of the psychic penetration, 'scream out' the prepared word/phrase/sigil or 'cast' the visualization with maximum force.
**Return**: Relax and gently guide awareness back to the physical body, ensuring a controlled and comfortable return from the astral ascent.

relevant_quotes.text: It is a common misconception that Enochian Magic is purely subjectively oriented. This misconception is not helped by the Golden Dawn presentations of the system, which revolve purely around skrying the Æthyrs, or the Pyramid Squares of the Watchtowers and so on. If this were all the substance that the Enochian system had to show, then I would not use it, for I have a very skeptical attitude towards a system or model that cannot be applied to cause observable change in the objective universe.

People who work within any specific magical system soon learn that until the system has been internalized and made your own - becoming a living series of keys to access those hard-to-reach places of your own psyche - no results can be attained with the system.

The idea behind this procedure is that your word, phrase, sigil, or whatever, after being cast adrift in the most remote depths of your psyche that you can reach, will follow back, and will do so by manifesting within the objective universe and returning to you by that route.

Let him continue in this so long as the breath of life is in him. Whatever threatens, whatever allures, though it were Typhon and all his hosts loosed from the pit and leagued against him, though it were from the very Throne of God Himself that a voice issues bidding him stay and be content, let him struggle on, ever on. - Aleister Crowley, Liber 0 vel Manus et Sagittæ

critical_analysis.relevance: This article is highly relevant to Setian and Left-Hand Path magical traditions, as it foregrounds the operative, results-oriented nature of magic. It provides a practical framework for a technique (rising on the planes) often mentioned but rarely detailed in other occult literature, contextualizing it within Enochian Magic and Crowley's work. It reinforces the Setian emphasis on individual Xeper and self-transformation as a means to effect both internal and external change.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The target audience consists of Initiates within the Temple of Set, particularly those familiar with Enochian Magic or other structured magical systems. It requires a commitment to deep personal work and system internalization, rather than superficial engagement. It also appeals to practitioners seeking to understand and apply operative LHP principles for tangible results in their lives.
